hero.title: Daily Routine
hero.text: Discipline is freedom. Here's how I structure my day to get the most out of both my mind and my body.

schedule.title: Waking Up & Light
schedule.desc: Directly outside to get sunlight in the eyes. A big cup of coffee and a quick review of the day's most important tasks.

schedule.title: Deep Work Block #1
schedule.desc: The hardest task first. Econometric modeling, coding, or heavy research.

schedule.title: Lunch & Walk
schedule.desc: Break from the screen. Often a walk while listening to a podcast about macroeconomics or tech.

schedule.title: Deep Work Block #2 / Meetings
schedule.desc: Second phase of work. Documentation, feedback, or project collaboration.

schedule.title: Machine Time (Gym)
schedule.desc: Switching focus entirely to the physical. Heavy lifts and momentum.

schedule.title: Reading & Reflection
schedule.desc: Wrapping up the day with analog reading. No screens before bedtime.
